data.title: Aurora
data.text:
Service Alerts

BNSF trains remain stopped

BNSF inbound and outbound trains remain stopped near Naperville due to police activity. Extensive delays anticipated. Metra will provide updates as they become available.

BNSF #1253 stopped/operational change

BNSF train #1253 scheduled to arrive Aurora at 5:27 pm, is stopped at Naperville due to police activity and will express from Naperville to Aurora. Train #1251 will accommodate passengers at intermediate stops.

BNSF #1284 - Operational Change

BNSF #1284, scheduled to depart Aurora at 5:05pm, will originate at Lisle due to ongoing police activity. Train #1292 will be the next inbound train to accommodate passengers from Aurora.

Metra Alert BNSF - Tracks #2, and #4, out of service at Chicago Union Station.

Tracks #2, and #4, are out of service on the south concourse at Chicago Union Station until further notice due to the Canal St., construction project. BNSF, Southwest Service, and Heritage Corridor passengers should check gate boards prior to boarding their trains. If you need help, please contact Metra personnel for assistance.

You can receive real-time alerts, specific to this line when you sign up for My Metra.
